minimap.title: MiniMap
minimap.options.title: MiniMap Options
minimap.options.minimap.north-locked.too: Sets if the minimap should lock with the north position facing up
minimap.options.minimap.circular.tooltip: Choose between circular and square minimap shapes
minimap.options.minimap.directions.toolt: Shows the cardinal directions around the minimap
minimap.options.minimap.bottom-text.tool:
Shows text below the minimap

{x} for x cord
{y} for y cord
{z} for z cord
{biome} for biome
{clock} for clock
minimap.options.minimap.clock-format.too:
Set the clock format

HH for 00-23 hours
hh for 1-12 hours
mm for minutes
a for AM/PM
How many ticks between texture updates

Note: Lower values may cause lag
minimap.options.minimap.position.tooltip: Set the position, size, and zoom of the minimap
minimap.options.minimap.position.help:
Drag the minimap to position
Mouse wheel to zoom
CTRL + mouse wheel to resize
Press ESC when done
